Body:
async with conn_dealer() as socket:
    await assertReplyDealer(socket, emergency.Action(False), ack.OK)
    await assertReplyDealer(socket, emergency.Request(), emergency.Reply(False)
        )
    sub = Subscription()
    sub.subscribe = False
    sub.timeout = 1000
    await assertReplyDealer(socket, emergency.Subscribe(sub), ack.
        FAILED_COMMAND)
    with assertImmediate():
        sub = Subscription()
        sub.subscribe = True
        sub.timeout = 1000
        await assertReplyDealer(socket, emergency.Subscribe(sub), ack.OK)
    sub.subscribe = False
    await assertReplyDealer(socket, emergency.Subscribe(sub), ack.OK)
pytest.mark.trio
